allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release: Farnsworth - Your Claude Companion AI

A self-evolving AI companion that integrates with Claude Code via MCP to provide:

- Persistent Memory: MemGPT-style virtual context with archival, conversational, and knowledge graph storage
- Memory Dreaming: Background consolidation that discovers patterns during idle time
- Agent Swarm: Specialist agents \(Code, Reasoning, Research, Creative\) for task delegation
- Self-Evolution: NSGA-II genetic optimization that improves based on interactions
- User Avatar: Learns preferences for personalized responses

Key Features:
- Multi-backend LLM support \(Ollama, llama.cpp, BitNet\)
- Cascade inference with confidence-based model escalation
- Hybrid RAG with semantic + keyword search
- Streamlit dashboard for visualization
- Comprehensive test suite
- Cross-platform \(Windows, macOS, Linux\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add comprehensive documentation, licensing, and roadmap

- Add dual license \(free for personal, commercial license required for enterprise\)
- Add USER_GUIDE.md with complete usage documentation
- Add ROADMAP.md with planned features through 2026
- Add CONTRIBUTING.md with contribution guidelines
- Update README.md with better branding and structure
- Link all documentation together

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(for f in farnsworth/__init__.py farnsworth/core/__init__.py farnsworth/core/llm_backend.py farnsworth/core/model_manager.py farnsworth/core/inference_engine.py)
Bash(for f in farnsworth/memory/virtual_context.py farnsworth/memory/working_memory.py farnsworth/memory/recall_memory.py farnsworth/memory/memory_dreaming.py)

Bash(for f in farnsworth/agents/__init__.py farnsworth/agents/base_agent.py farnsworth/agents/swarm_orchestrator.py farnsworth/agents/specialist_agents.py farnsworth/agents/user_avatar.py farnsworth/agents/meta_cognition.py)
Bash(for f in farnsworth/rag/embeddings.py farnsworth/rag/hybrid_retriever.py farnsworth/rag/document_processor.py farnsworth/rag/self_refining_rag.py)

Bash(for f in farnsworth/evolution/__init__.py farnsworth/evolution/genetic_optimizer.py farnsworth/evolution/fitness_tracker.py farnsworth/evolution/lora_evolver.py farnsworth/evolution/behavior_mutation.py)

Bash(ssh -o ConnectTimeout=30 root@194.68.245.145 -p 22177 -i ~/.ssh/runpod_key 'cd /workspace/Farnsworth && git fetch origin && git reset --hard origin/main && pkill -9 python; sleep 2; nohup python farnsworth/web/server.py > /tmp/farnsworth.log 2>&1 & sleep 4; curl -s http://localhost:8080/api/status | head -c 80')

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Stop-Process -Name python -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; Start-Process -FilePath ''python'' -ArgumentList ''farnsworth/web/server.py'' -WorkingDirectory ''C:/Fawnsworth'' -WindowStyle Hidden")
Bash(do ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o ConnectTimeout=15 root@194.68.245.145 -p 22177 -i ~/.ssh/runpod_key "echo ''Try $i: connected''")
Bash(do ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o ConnectTimeout=10 root@194.68.245.145 -p 22177 -i ~/.ssh/runpod_key "pkill -f ''python.*server.py'' 2>/dev/null || echo ''Done $i''")
Bash(do ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@194.68.245.145 -p 22177 -i ~/.ssh/runpod_key "pkill -f ''python.*server.py'' 2>/dev/null || true; echo ''Killed''")

Bash(do ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@194.68.245.145 -p 22177 -i ~/.ssh/runpod_key "pkill -f server.py; sleep 1; cd /workspace/Farnsworth && PYTHONPATH=/workspace/Farnsworth nohup python farnsworth/web/server.py > /tmp/farnsworth.log 2>&1 & echo ''Started''")

Bash(do ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@194.68.245.145 -p 22177 -i ~/.ssh/runpod_key "pkill -f server.py; cd /workspace/Farnsworth && PYTHONPATH=/workspace/Farnsworth nohup python farnsworth/web/server.py > /tmp/farnsworth.log 2>&1 & echo Started")

Bash(do ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@194.68.245.145 -p 22177 -i ~/.ssh/runpod_key "pgrep -f server.py || \(cd /workspace/Farnsworth && PYTHONPATH=/workspace/Farnsworth nohup python farnsworth/web/server.py > /tmp/farnsworth.log 2>&1 & echo ''Started''\)")

Bash(/c/Windows/py.exe -c "
import subprocess
import time

# Start server
proc = subprocess.Popen\([r''C:\\Windows\\py.exe'', ''main.py''], 
                       stdout=open\(''logs/farnsworth.log'', ''w''\),
                       stderr=subprocess.STDOUT\)
print\(f''Server started with PID: {proc.pid}''\)
")

Bash(git -C C:/Fawnsworth commit -m "feat: token scanner + API knowledge base + expanded LLM list

- Add token scanner: detects CAs in swarm chat, fetches DexScreener data
- Add API knowledge base for bot collective memory
- Expand README with 15+ LLM providers \(ChatGPT, Mistral, Perplexity, etc\)
- Add Bankr as primary trading engine in crypto section
- Merge server-side changes \(grok, x_automation agents\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C C:/Fawnsworth commit -m "docs: update .env.example with all 31 supported API keys

- 15+ LLM providers \(OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Grok, Mistral, etc\)
- Crypto/DeFi APIs \(Bankr, Helius, Alchemy, Infura\)
- Social media \(X/Twitter, Discord\)
- Productivity \(Notion, GitHub\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C C:/Fawnsworth commit -m "docs: comprehensive feature index - ALL models, agents, tools, integrations

- 15+ LLM providers with full model lists
- 18+ agent types with specializations
- 18 memory systems documented
- 7 cognitive engines \(quantum, neuromorphic, causal, affective\)
- 70+ integrations across 17 categories
- 30+ tools catalogued
- Learning, evolution, RAG systems
- Enterprise compliance features

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>")
